sentences.sContent: She’s two years older than me.
That’s me, standing on the left.
sentences.sCn: 那是我，站在左边的那一个。

synos.tran: 自我；极端自私的人；自我的一部分

trans.tranOther: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself
